name: Mission impossible: save the christmas
description:
It's time to save christmas! Santa claus has lost all of his present and he doesn't know how to get them back, therefore you're going to use use his prodigious hat to regain them.

Controls:

You have to hold down the left button to make the hat follow you, you have to collect the green presents to get an higher score, but avoid the red ones, because they're dangerous!
